script.title: Query To View
instructions: Specify a single query and choose legacy or standard mode.
For PLX use: SELECT * FROM [plx.google:FULL_TABLE_NAME.all] WHERE...
If the view exists, it is unchanged, delete it manually to re-create.

field.name: legacy
field.description: Query type must match source tables.

field.name: view
field.description: View to create from this query.
